Walmart, 50th anniversary

Motion Design, Flash / AS 3

Jamie always has impeccable attention to detail. He turned something quite complicated into something very simple and elegant.

James B., Owner, Creative Director, Digital Agua., 2011

From the big picture, to the subtle details.

Back when Flash / Action Script was still cool, I had the distinct pleasure of working with Whittman Hart in L.A. on a project to overhaul the Budweiser online presence. The Creative Director was a good friend, and we had a blast working on the conceptual development together.

Request:
Make Dale Earnhardt Jr. look bad ass in an interactive rich media promo for Budweiser.
